consider.from sentence: Motivated by this approach , we consider bottom - up attention for neural abstractive summarization .

first selects.from sentence: Our approach first selects a selection mask for the source document and then constrains a standard neural model by this mask .

incorporates.from sentence: Our full model incorporates a separate content selection system to decide on relevant aspects of the source document .

frame.from sentence: We frame this selection task as a sequence - tagging problem , with the objective of identifying tokens from a document that are part of its summary .

employ.from sentence: To incorporate bottom - up attention into abstractive summarization models , we employ masking to constrain copying words to the selected parts of the text , which produces grammatical outputs .
